Introduction

Lee Minhyuk is a South Korean singer and actor under Starship Entertainment. He is best known as the visual and vocalist of the boy group Monsta X. Minhyuk is considered as the moodmaker of the group since his jokes tend to brighten the mood.

Minhyuk debuted as a member of MONSTA X on May 14, 2015 with their first mini-album "Trespass".
Minhyuk was an MC for “Inkygayo”. (October 20, 2019 – February 28, 2021)
